Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.data

Class CustomerDataManagerTest

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.data.CustomerDataManagerTest
public class CustomerDataManagerTest extends Object
Integration tests for CustomerDataManager. Tests that email is correctly saved to and loaded from files.
